name: Sleeping Bag
description:
In Sleeping Bag, every few seconds, you will be able to control either the character or the background.

Grab the key and get to the door as fast as you can in 3 different levels!!

The character is a little boy trapped in his dreams, help him escape!

The bar at the bottom shows how much time you've got before the control changes.

  • Left & Right arrow keys to move the level
  • Arrow keys to move the character

Have Fun!!
